description:
CENTURY 21 Mobile brings the most accurate and up to date real estate information right to your phone! With CENTURY 21 Mobile, you have access to all CENTURY 21 homes for sale and MLS listings across the U.S. You don’t have to be working with a CENTURY 21 real estate agent or broker to start searching with this powerful app. 
Use CENTURY 21 anytime, anywhere to pull up homes for sale around you using the GPS search or find homes based on address, city or zip code. You can narrow your search results by selecting the property type you’re looking for, your price range, the number of bedrooms and bathrooms and the distance. CENTURY 21 will show you all the details you want to know about a property, including price, square footage, estimated mortgage, taxes, features, descriptions, pictures, maps, directions to the property and more! Save your favorite homes to view later. You can also text or email listings to your friends. 
If you have questions or want a tour of the home for sale, press the “Contact” feature to contact a CENTURY 21 Real Estate representative who can assist you.
Share the app with any cell phone user using the “Share this App” feature located on the main menu!
